About Me

I’m a passionate full-stack developer with hands-on experience in building dynamic and responsive web applications using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js). I specialize in creating clean user interfaces, managing backend APIs, and deploying scalable applications. Whether it’s designing a frontend layout, handling data flow with React hooks, or integrating a secure backend, I aim to deliver smooth and impactful user experiences.
